about_the_game: This pack allows you to jump in and drive the CN GP9 Phase I & II locomotives in your own sessions. Find them under the Trains Tab by searching for 'ITC' in Surveyor.
detailed_description: This pack allows you to jump in and drive the CN GP9 Phase I & II locomotives in your own sessions. Find them under the Trains Tab by searching for 'ITC' in Surveyor.
legal_notice: Published and developed by N3V Games Pty Ltd . N3V Games, Trainz and their respective logos are trademarks of N3V Games.  All other trademarks, logos and copyrights are property of their respective owners. All rights reserved.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 11.6
  • Processor: Intel i5 2Ghz
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Radeon Pro 555 with 1GB VRAM supporting OpenGL 3.3
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

short_description: This pack allows you to jump in and drive the CN GP9 Phase I & II locomotives in your own sessions. Find them under the Trains Tab by searching for 'ITC' in Surveyor.
supported_languages: English, Italian, Spanish - Spain, Czech, Dutch, Polish, Portuguese - Portugal, Russian, Simplified Chinese
